mapper.select: SELECT cr.id,cr.cid,cr.uid,cr.pid,cr.cpid,cr.display_id,cr.submit_id,cr.username,cr.status,cr.submit_time, cr.time,cr.score,cr.use_time,cr.checked,cr.gmt_create,cr.gmt_modified, u.gender,u.realname as realname,u.avatar,u.school,u.nickname FROM contest_record cr,user_info u WHERE cr.uid = u.uuid AND cr.cid = #{cid} AND cr.status IS NOT NULL AND cr.username != #{username} ORDER BY cr.time ASC
